heading_path: Chapter 1 Product Overview RetirePlus 2024 is a participating life annuity covering ages 0-55 with lifetime protection. > Section 1 Key Responsibilities (a) Survival benefit: starting from policy year 5 pay 30% of base sum assured each year. (b) Maturity benefit: at age 100 pay 120% of accumulated premium.
text: Section 1 Key Responsibilities (a) Survival benefit: starting from policy year 5 pay 30% of base sum assured each year. (b) Maturity benefit: at age 100 pay 120% of accumulated premium.

Chapter 1 Product Overview RetirePlus 2024 is a participating life annuity covering ages 0-55 with lifetime protection. > 1. Premium options: 3, 5, or 10 year payment schedules.
text: 1. Premium options: 3, 5, or 10 year payment schedules.
